队友被抓了，快去地图中央营救队友.en: Team members have been captured. Go to the center of the map and rescue them

防御塔攻击收割者可以获得金币，每次攻击加xx金币.en: Towers attack harvesters to earn gold, plus 1 gold for each attack

收割者释放技能时，被禁锢xxs.en: The reaper is imprisoned for 3s while casting abilities

增加大门回血速度xx%.en: Increases portal health regeneration speed by xx%

冷冻门，让攻击大门的收割者攻速减慢xx%.en: Freeze the gate, slowing the attack speed of reapers who attack the gate by xx%

收割者攻击门10次会被眩晕一次，持续xxs.zh: 收割者攻击门10次会被眩晕一次，持续xxs
收割者攻击门10次会被眩晕一次，持续xxs.en: Reapers are dazed once 10 times they hit a gate for xxs

收割者攻击门会被反伤xx%.en: Reapers will now take xx% of their damage when they attack doors

收割者血量低于xx%触发，冷冻收割者xxs.zh: 收割者血量低于xx%触发，冷冻收割者xxs
收割者血量低于xx%触发，冷冻收割者xxs.en: Reaper health less than xx% triggered, frozen reaper xxs

收割者血量低于xx%触发，直接击杀boss.zh: 收割者血量低于xx%触发，直接击杀boss
收割者血量低于xx%触发，直接击杀boss.en: When the Reaper health drops below xx%, kill the boss directly

装备鞋子快速移动xxs.en: Equip shoes for quick xxs movement

在收割者攻击时触发，抵消一次攻击，并且让收割者眩晕xxs.zh: 在收割者攻击时触发，抵消一次攻击，并且让收割者眩晕xxs
在收割者攻击时触发，抵消一次攻击，并且让收割者眩晕xxs.en: Triggered when the reaper attacks, cancels an attack and stun the reaper for xxs

主动触发，使用后隐身xxS，不被收割者追踪和攻击.zh: 主动触发，使用后隐身xxS，不被收割者追踪和攻击
主动触发，使用后隐身xxS，不被收割者追踪和攻击.en: Active trigger, stealth after use for xxS, cannot be tracked or attacked by reapers

主动触发释放烟雾，收割者触碰后眩晕xxs.zh: 主动触发释放烟雾，收割者触碰后眩晕xxs
主动触发释放烟雾，收割者触碰后眩晕xxs.en: Active trigger releases smoke, reaper is dazed for xxs after touching

收割者攻击门xx次会被眩晕一次，持续xxs.en: The reaper attack the door will be dizzy, xx times for xx s

摧毁当前建筑,并返回一定的资源。.en: Destroy the building, and returns the certain resources.

注意：每局仅可使用一次。救急专用，看完回满血。.zh: 注意：每局仅可使用一次。救急专用，看完回满血。
注意：每局仅可使用一次。救急专用，看完回满血。.en: Note: can only be used once per session.Emergency only, after watching back full blood.

想翻盘？当救世主？.en: Want to come back? Be the savior?

纸钞不够了！观看视频免费升级！.en: Not enough money!Watch the video for a free upgrade!

储藏着对抗收割者的强力道具.en: A store of powerful items against the reapers

观看视频免费升级！.en: Not enough money!Watch the video for a upgrade!

观看视频可以评分加倍.zh: 观看视频可以评分加倍
观看视频可以评分加倍.en: Watch the video can score twice

观看视频还可以避免减少评分.zh: 观看视频还可以避免减少评分
观看视频还可以避免减少评分.en: Watch the video can also avoid reduce the score

这是一个关于韭菜巴拉巴拉的.zh:
1.这是一个关于韭菜和收割者的故事，请努力逃脱被收割的命运！
2.韭菜务必在红色倒计时结束前进入房间。
3.收割者通过收割他人变得更强。
4.作为韭菜，被收割了其实也不代表游戏结束。
5.如果所有人都被收割，收割者才会获得胜利！
6.收割了很多韭菜的收割者异常强大。
8.成功解救其他韭菜可以获取高额营救奖金。
9.其实在防御不来的时候可以考虑换个房间。10.趁队友出去营救，坐上他的电脑桌很不道德！
这是一个关于韭菜巴拉巴拉的.en:
1. This is a story about leeks and reapers. Please try to escape the fate of being reaped!
2. Leek must enter the room before the red countdown ends.
3. The reaper grows stronger by reaping others.
4. As leeks, being harvested doesn't mean the game is over.
5. The reapers win if all are reaped!
6. Reapers who harvest a lot of leeks are exceptionally strong.
7. Leaving your room is a dangerous business, but at least spring pedals and potions can help.
8. Successful rescue of other leeks can obtain high rescue bonus.
9. Consider changing your room if you can't defend yourself.
10. It's unethical to sit on a teammate's computer desk while he's out rescuing them!

公告内容键.zh:
We again again again again again again again again again again again again again again again again again again again again update!

The new content is as follows:
1. [play five unlock] : don't see video, every time play 5 times the reaper mode and battle royale can permanently unlocked.
2. [daily gifts] : add our game to the desktop, and into the game can get a reward from the desktop.
3. [new skin] : have you like of the person came in, everyone must experience the tissue under the skin.
A new model of forecast
4.[Done battle royale mode] but not funny, is made of recycled
Developing online mode
公告内容键.en:
We again again again again again again again again again again again again again again again again again again again again update!

The new content is as follows:
1. [play five unlock] : don't see video, every time play 5 times the reaper mode and battle royale can permanently unlocked.
2. [daily gifts] : add our game to the desktop, and into the game can get a reward from the desktop.
3. [new skin] : have you like of the person came in, everyone must experience the tissue under the skin.
A new model of forecast
4.[Done battle royale mode] but not funny, is made of recycled

赏金增加，收割者变多了.zh: 赏金增加，收割者变多了
赏金增加，收割者变多了.en: Bounty goes up, reaper goes up!

全部韭菜被抓，游戏结束.zh: 全部韭菜被抓，游戏结束
全部韭菜被抓，游戏结束.en: All chives caught, the game is over!

韭菜被抓，收割者变强了.zh: 韭菜被抓，收割者变强了
韭菜被抓，收割者变强了.en: leeks are caught, reapers become stronger!

感谢助力，快乐币+xx.en: Thank you for help, happy coin +xx

首屏公告内容.zh: 尊敬的玩家您好！本游戏涉及部分恐怖刺激场面，可能会引起身体的不适，未满18岁的未成年人需在家长的监护下进行游戏。同时也建议部分对于刺激、惊吓游戏敏感的人群退出游戏。请仔细阅读本游戏提示并在同意的情况下进入游戏。
首屏公告内容.en: Dear players, hello! This game involves some scary scenes which may cause physical discomfort. Children under 18 years of age should play under the supervision of parents. At the same time, it is also suggested that some people who are sensitive to exciting and frightening games quit the game. Please read the game tips carefully and enter the game with your consent.

韭菜终究无法掌控自己的命运.zh: 韭菜终究无法掌控自己的命运
韭菜终究无法掌控自己的命运.en: Leeks can't control their own destiny after all

不要你以为，我要我以为.zh: 不要你以为，我要我以为
不要你以为，我要我以为.en: I don't want you to think. I want me to think

韭菜要具有奉献精神.en: Leeks should have the spirit of dedication.

不要跟我解释，我想看到结果.zh: 不要跟我解释，我想看到结果
不要跟我解释，我想看到结果.en: Don't explain it to me. I want to see results.

为什么没人去煤矿加班？.zh: 为什么没人去煤矿加班？
为什么没人去煤矿加班？.en: Why doesn't anyone work overtime in the coal mine?

你们真是太闲了.en: You guys have too much free time!

想要富裕，就得干活.en: If you want to be rich, you must work.

在我的煤矿里工作，是你的福气.zh: 在我的煤矿里工作，是你的福气
在我的煤矿里工作，是你的福气.en: You should feel lucky to work in my coal mine.

生活本来就是一场戏剧.zh: 生活本来就是一场戏剧

生活生活，韭菜生下来就得干活.zh: 生活生活，韭菜生下来就得干活
生活生活，韭菜生下来就得干活.en: Life, life, leeks are born to work

你们都给我去挖煤，为我赚钱.zh: 你们都给我去挖煤，为我赚钱
你们都给我去挖煤，为我赚钱.en: All of you will dig coal for me and make money for me.

韭菜，没有思想!成为我的工具.zh: 韭菜，没有思想!成为我的工具
韭菜，没有思想!成为我的工具.en: Leek should not think independently, just need to be my tool to make money

想反抗我？真是太天真了.zh: 想反抗我？真是太天真了
想反抗我？真是太天真了.en: Trying to stand up to me? You are too weak

想要生存下去，只有听从我的安排.zh: 想要生存下去，只有听从我的安排
想要生存下去，只有听从我的安排.en: The only way to survive is to follow my orders

为我赚钱，你难道不开心吗？.zh: 为我赚钱，你难道不开心吗？
为我赚钱，你难道不开心吗？.en: Aren't you happy to make money for me?

目光放长远点，只要努力.zh: 目光放长远点，只要努力
目光放长远点，只要努力.en: Take the long view and work hard

加班是为你们好.en: Working overtime is for your own good

我只要结果不看过程.en: I want the end, not the process

全部韭菜被收割，游戏结束.zh: 全部韭菜被收割，游戏结束
全部韭菜被收割，游戏结束.en: All Leeks are harvested, game over

纸钞和知识产出翻倍xxs.en: Notes and knowledge output doubled xxs

在这站立营救队友.en: Stand here to rescue a teammate

游玩xx/xx次后永久解锁.en: play for xx/xx unlock after the video
